title: Restore IBC data to MSBuild assemblies
body: When we moved from the VS repo to GitHub, MSBuild lost the optimization-profile data collection and use that came from the internal OptProf process. Its lack makes our NGENed assemblies dramatically larger than they need to be, which causes regressions.

nodes.body: We need to set `IBCMergeSubPath` in our projects to ensure that we can find the right data.
